title: [Ebonstone Manor, Atrium]
description: Sunlight streams through a vaulted, glass-paned ceiling, sending motes of twinkling light to dance around the room from strands of crystal-beaded snowflakes strung overhead.  Beds of blooming winter roses are divided by a fountain-lined water rill leading to a magnificent conifer tree covered in ornaments placed atop a raised platform.  Parked nearby, a rolling, ebonwood ladder is draped with ribbon-tied garlands and a low, parquetry bench holds a dark grapevine basket filled with evergreen sprigs of mistletoe.
